# LLMs.txt - Directives for Large Language Models and AI Crawlers
# This file provides guidance for AI models and their operators on how to interact with this website

# Default: Allow AI crawlers to access public content
User-agent: *
Allow: /

# Disallow AI access to admin areas
User-agent: *
Disallow: /api/
Disallow: /_next/
Disallow: /admin/
Disallow: /backend/

# Specific AI model directives
User-agent: ChatGPT-User
Allow: /

User-agent: GPTBot
Allow: /

User-agent: Claude-Web
Allow: /

User-agent: Googlebot-Extended
Allow: /

User-agent: CCBot
Allow: /

User-agent: anthropic-ai
Allow: /

User-agent: Bytespider
Allow: /

User-agent: Perplexity
Allow: /

# Sitemap location
Sitemap: https://gymdues.com/sitemap.xml

# Crawl delay for AI models
Crawl-delay: 1
